com.intland.codebeamer.manager

Class AbstractEntityManagerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.dao.support.DaoSupport
      • org.mybatis.spring.support.SqlSessionDaoSupport
        • com.intland.codebeamer.persistence.dao.AbstractDao
          • com.intland.codebeamer.manager.AbstractEntityManagerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.intland.codebeamer.license.LicenseAware, EntityManager, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArtifactApprovalManager, ArtifactManager, AssociationManager, EntityLabelManager, EntityReferenceManager, ProjectManager, ReportManager, ScmPullRequestManager, ScmRepositoryManager, TrackerItemManager, TrackerManager, TrackerViewManager, UserManager, WikiPageManager, WorkingSetManager

    public abstract class AbstractEntityManagerImpl
extends com.intland.codebeamer.persistence.dao.AbstractDao
implements com.intland.codebeamer.license.LicenseAware, EntityManager
    Each concrete Business Layer manager class should extend this.

        Get a localized text
        Parameters:
        request - is the request to determine the locale
        key - is the text key
        text - is the default text
        args - are optional values for text placeholders

      • joinNames

        public java.lang.String joinNames(java.util.Locale locale,
                         java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> names,
                         boolean lastAnd)
        Concatenate the specified collection of names into a String, where each name is enclosed in "" and separated by a comma, except the last pair, which is separated by the "logical.and.label" or "logical.or.label", depending on lastAnd.
        Parameters:
        locale - is the locale to determine the language for the "logical.and/or.label" resource
        names - is a Collection of names to concatenate
        lastAnd - true to separated the last name pair with the "logical.and.label", or false, to separated the last name pair with the "logical.or.label"
        Returns:
        a concatenated name string
        Since:
        CB-7.1
